item.description:
Join us to share how you are increasing your awareness and utilizing L.O.A. in your life to attract what you want.

If you respond yes and find you can no longer attend, please change your response in order to create space for someone else to join us. Looking forward to seeing everyone.

Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us in the back room just beyond the soda station from 10a.m.-11:30a.m.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: February- Weekend L.O.A. Meetup
